A

answerBlock - Variable in class controllers.GameController
 

C

controllers - package controllers
This package contains the controllers behind the FXML files of the application.

D

dataButton - Variable in class controllers.ResultController
 

G

GameController - Class in controllers
The GameController is the code behind the game.fxml.
GameController() - Constructor for class controllers.GameController
 
getAnswer() - Method in class models.Question
 
getQuestion() - Method in class models.Question
 

I

initdata(String, String) - Method in class controllers.GameController
This function simply sets in the username display with data it receive from the launch.fxml
initdata(String, String, int, int) - Method in class controllers.ResultController
This function simply makes a one-time setting in of the labels it's going to show, displaying the final results.
initialize() - Method in class controllers.GameController
With this function we start up the entire FXML.

L

LaunchController - Class in controllers
The LaunchController is the controller of the loading screen
LaunchController() - Constructor for class controllers.LaunchController
 
loadNewQuestion() - Static method in class models.Question
 

M

main - package main
This package contains the main files of the project, that are responsible for starting up the entire application.
main(String[]) - Static method in class main.Main
 
Main - Class in main
The Main class starts up the entire program, by starting the MyApplication class.
Main() - Constructor for class main.Main
 
models - package models
This package contains the models of the application.
MyApplication - Class in main
This class loads up the launch screen.
MyApplication() - Constructor for class main.MyApplication
 

N

newQuestion() - Method in class controllers.GameController
The first function is newQuestion().
nextQuestionAsked() - Method in class controllers.GameController
Here we declare what happens when someone clicks on the nextQuestionButton.

O

onlyDigits(TextField) - Method in class controllers.GameController
Since this is a number-guessing game, we don't really want any letters or any other types of characters as an answer.

P

personalxmlreader - Variable in class controllers.GameController
 
personalXmlReader - Class in models
The personalXmlReader class executes the question loading.

Question - Class in models

S

score1 - Variable in class controllers.GameController
 
score2 - Variable in class controllers.GameController
 
setAnswer(String) - Method in class models.Question
 
setQuestion(String) - Method in class models.Question
 
setScores() - Method in class controllers.GameController
In the setScores() function, again, as one can guess from it's name, we are setting in the correct player scores.
showResults(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.GameController
By pressing the getResultsButton, we call the showResults() function.
start(Stage) - Method in class main.MyApplication
 
startGame(ActionEvent) - Method in class controllers.LaunchController
Once the startGame button is clicked, we do a verification wether both of the usernames were filled.

T

timer() - Method in class controllers.GameController
I think we can say that this is the most complicated function in the entire project.

U

update() - Method in class controllers.GameController
The update() function, coming from it's name is responsible for updating the main screen every round.

W
